body:
A story that shakes the heart and
A hero who couldn't fight.
The name of a hero goes to the sacrifices and victims who persevere to the end.
The three souls of the young girls.
In a prison cell, amidst the malicious infliction of day and night.
The light of dawn shines on them, the
Hearts warm them.
The Trinity.
Their bonds and courage.
Become the heroes of the world.
The one who will never fall.
That true destiny.
The one who truly conquers it.
To Kawady MAX
